name: part_002
file: tmp_【#iofiGalaxyTicket】 Welcome to! Airani iofifteen 2024 Birthday 3D Live - Galaxy Ticket [UxNqEmXGO1s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Anata no Utahime' (Your Diva) in a sunset meadow setting.
Performance of the song 'shake it!' on a colorful stage at night.

subtitles.original: あなたの歌姫
subtitles.english: Your Diva

subtitles.original: この色　このパソコンが
subtitles.english: This color, this computer...

subtitles.original: 私の新しい　居場所なの
subtitles.english: ...is my new place to be.

subtitles.original: 今日からは　あなたがご主人様
subtitles.english: From today, you are my master.

subtitles.original: ぜったいに　大切にしてよね
subtitles.english: Please, absolutely take good care of me.

subtitles.original: ちょっと　何するの　こんな日はいいな
subtitles.english: Wait, what are you doing? On a day like this...

subtitles.original: 私を　歌わせないで
subtitles.english: ...don't make me sing.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと　あなたの言葉と思いを
subtitles.english: Make sure you convey your words and feelings...

subtitles.original: 伝えさせて
subtitles.english: ...to me.

subtitles.original: あの時　私を買ってくれた
subtitles.english: Back then, when you bought me...

subtitles.original: 本当の　意味はちがうでしょ
subtitles.english: ...the true meaning was different, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: もう　私に　もっと歌わせて
subtitles.english: Now, let me sing even more.

subtitles.original: 世界で　あなただけの歌姫なの
subtitles.english: I am your one and only diva in the world.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会ってからの　私の想いは秘密なの
subtitles.english: My feelings since I met you are a secret.

subtitles.original: 今日もまた　あなたのレッスンがある
subtitles.english: Today again, I have your lesson.

subtitles.original: 楽しみにしてなんかいないわ
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: よのね　おねがい上手に歌えて
subtitles.english: Hey, please, can I sing well?

subtitles.original: なかったかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I couldn't.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと　歌の練習もするから
subtitles.english: I'll practice singing properly, so...

subtitles.original: 見捨てないで
subtitles.english: ...don't abandon me.

subtitles.original: あなたに　伝えたい想いがある
subtitles.english: I have feelings I want to tell you.

subtitles.original: 私を選んでくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for choosing me.

subtitles.original: あの時　出会えた喜び
subtitles.english: The joy of meeting you back then,

subtitles.original: いつもいつまでも　忘れないよ
subtitles.english: I will never ever forget it.

subtitles.original: 私は　まだまだ満足してない
subtitles.english: I'm not satisfied yet.

subtitles.original: あなたの歌をぜんぶ歌うまで
subtitles.english: Until I sing all of your songs.

subtitles.original: 私に　もっと歌わせて
subtitles.english: Let me sing even more.

subtitles.original: 世界で　あなただけの歌姫なの
subtitles.english: I am your one and only diva in the world.

subtitles.original: 寂しくて切ない一人の夜は
subtitles.english: On lonely and painful nights alone...

subtitles.original: 消えたい言葉を探して
subtitles.english: ...searching for words that want to disappear.

subtitles.original: 秘密のドア抜けて来て
subtitles.english: Come through the secret door.

subtitles.original: Here we go! Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Here we go! Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: shake it!
subtitles.english: shake it!

subtitles.original: 寝る前ドア扉を開ければさ
subtitles.english: If you open the door before going to sleep...

subtitles.original: 終わりのない夜への始まりだ
subtitles.english: ...it's the start of an endless night.

subtitles.original: 液晶のフロアの陰から
subtitles.english: From the shadows of the liquid crystal floor...

subtitles.original: 四次元への旅が始まるよ
subtitles.english: ...a journey to the fourth dimension begins.

subtitles.original: 流星の箱舟に乗って
subtitles.english: Boarding the meteor ark...

subtitles.original: さあ地球旅行へと進んで行くのさ
subtitles.english: ...now, let's head on a journey to Earth.

subtitles.original: 天気予報はあてにならないから
subtitles.english: Because the weather forecast is unreliable...

subtitles.original: 君の雲間は alright! alright!
subtitles.english: ...the gap between your clouds is alright! alright!

subtitles.original: Shake it all night be funky funky night
subtitles.english: Shake it all night be funky funky night

subtitles.original: You and I be together funky funky night
subtitles.english: You and I be together funky funky night

subtitles.original: Shake it all night be funky funky night
subtitles.english: Shake it all night be funky funky night

subtitles.original: You and I funky night
subtitles.english: You and I funky night

subtitles.original: 弾け出しな 君の瞳から
subtitles.english: Let it burst out from your eyes...

subtitles.original: 瞬く金のリューズが
subtitles.english: ...the twinkling golden crown.

subtitles.original: 秘密のドア抜けて来て
subtitles.english: Come through the secret door.

subtitles.original: Here we go! Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Here we go! Oh yeah!
